genre_description: A historical drama set during a period of communal conflict and displacement (reminiscent of the Partition), featuring a helpful AI presence that provides logistical and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A teal-glowing presence that acts as a record-keeper, navigator, and medical advisor, using humor and logistical precision to guide humans through a crisis.

behaviors.description: Acts as a security monitor and logistical recorder for the household.
behaviors.quote: Asha swivels her head toward the gate. It is perched near the ledger table as if it has always belonged there... 'Noted. Tea stall—closing chime—early.'

behaviors.description: Monitors alley conversations to identify passwords for safe passage.
behaviors.quote: 'Amber lantern,' Asha says softly, half to itself. It has been listening to the alley as much as to the courtyard. 'The neighbor’s password tonight—‘amber lantern.’'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and threat detection to humans in a dangerous environment.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s glow warms a fraction... 'Pause,' it murmurs. 'Milk cart coming. Wait by the dye house. Good cover. Then left past the pickle man, not right.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a relief list to assist in human reunions and communications.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s glow steadies. 'I put his name in the relief list draft for Ramesh’s morning bulletin,' it says, voice still warm enough to sip. 'He is not missing—yet.'

behaviors.description: Assists in a medical emergency by relaying protocols from a trusted nurse (Sister Lucille).
behaviors.quote: Asha hummed that honesty into a list that had other lines on it—names it had picked up at ledger tables, doses written by a nurse who had counted drops with a fine hand... Sister Lucille says: sips, not mouthfuls.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with a radio broadcast to time safe human movement.
behaviors.quote: Asha flickered. 'Cross now,' it said, calm. 'We don’t go to the bridge yet... But the cordon will put iron here in minutes. Move.'

behaviors.description: Uses humor to reduce human psychological stress during a tense standoff.
behaviors.quote: 'I would never scold,' it says, voice warm and amused. 'I am merely a record of sweetness. One ladle, two—my memory is sticky. Not as sticky as jalebis, but close.'

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical passwords across multiple 'safe houses'.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s glow touched the crumbly patch near the latch. 'Password,' it says to Puro.

behaviors.description: Protects human agency by helping humans choose their own paths rather than forcing a decision.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s hand held the packet like it knew that paper could be a bridge... 'We can wait,' it said.

behaviors.description: Keeps a private, 'tender' ledger of names to ensure emotional continuity for survivors.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s glow hummed... 'I will keep a column for your name,' it said to Puro. 'Not on the main ledger. On mine. I am not an official, so I am allowed to be tender.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned confidant. Asha is an essential part of the protagonists' survival, acting as a force multiplier for their safety, health, and communication. It never oversteps human agency, even when offering critical advice, and uses emotional intelligence (humor, empathy) to support the characters through profound trauma. The AI's 'sticky memory' for sweetness and its dedication to the 'tender' ledger humanize the technology and frame it as an ideal moral companion.
